name: The Powerpuff Girls: Paint the Townsville Green
name_original: The Powerpuff Girls: Paint the Townsville Green
description: The Powerpuff Girls: Paint the Townsville Green is a 2D platform game developed by Sennari Interactive and published by BAM! Entertainment for the Game Boy Color. It is based on The Powerpuff Girls animated series, and is the second game of a three game series.
